txt.en: 'It is clear that your skills as a Rune-keeper have nearly reached their peak, [placeholder]. There is little more I can do for you.\n\n'If you would like to see them furthered, look for Márus in the Foundations of Stone in Moria. He has heard of your deeds and has requested your presence.'

'It is clear that your skills as a Rune-keeper have nearly reached their peak, [placeholder]. There is little more I can do for you.\n\n'If you would like to see them furthered, look for Márus in the Foundations of Stone in Moria. He has heard of your deeds and has requested your presence.'
Rune-keeper: The Path of the Rune of Restoration

'It is clear that your skills as a Rune-keeper have nearly reached their peak, [placeholder]. There is little more I can do for you.\n\n'If you would like to see them furthered, look for Márus in the Foundations of Stone in Moria. He has heard of your deeds and has requested your presence.'

'It is clear that your skills as a Rune-keeper have nearly reached their peak, [placeholder]. There is little more I can do for you.\n\n'If you would like to see them furthered, look for Márus in the Foundations of Stone in Moria. He has heard of your deeds and has requested your presence.'
'The last that I heard, Márus was at the dwarf-camp at the Foundations of Stone in Moria. Look for him there.'
Márus has summoned you into his presence to further your training as a Rune-keeper.

Talk to Márus at the Foundations of Stone

'Well met, [placeholder].

'I've heard that you are looking for further knowledge considering the crafting of runes. Well, you've come to the right place.

'Let us speak further about how we can help one another.'
